this is sum fuckin BS im having the same problem as SAM ok im not computer dumb or anything but for the love of God can someone put step by step instructions and dnt be leaven any thing out cause this shit aint workin
ok can someone tell me step by step instructions plz

Windows 7 32-bit install

1 Download torrent.
2 Open your download folder.
3 Find RAR file
4 Extract 
5 OPen new Extract folder.
6 Open Start> Computer> C-drive> Program Files
7 Drag Windows MovieMaker 6.0 from Extract folder to Program Files folder
8 In Extract folder, right click "install moviemk dlls" file
9 Click Enter
10 Click Enter
11 Click Enter
12 Click Enter (I think there was four enters, maybe five, lol)

13 Click to close system window.
14 In the Windows Movie Maker folder now located in c:Program Files, Right-click the Movie Maker application icon and make Shortcut, placing said shortcut on desktop.
15 Go back to PB and give props.

~ finis

In step 8, that should read as: 

8 In Extract folder, right click "install moviemk dlls" file, RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR

For people having problems installing. One thing everyone left out and did not say. 

After moving the Movie Maker file folder in the Program files you also have to move the "install moviemk dlls" file into the folder too. Then you can run the file as admin.

Ok, I can consider myself a noob, that's why I am the one who's about to solve your problems! 
(first of all sorry for my english, I am brazilian..)

1- Open the file with winrar
2- extract the file (probably will go to your desk top)
3- In this file will be 4 things...
a) windos m.m.6
b)install...
c)read me
d)unistall...
4) Ok, so you have win7, so click on your start button, than computer, than local disk, that program file.
5)You will move the first thing of your desk top file (win m.m 6) to the program file, and leave the other 3 there...
6) In your desk top file, click in the first one (instal mm...) with the right button and click run as administrator.. Than click ok,ok,ok.,.... 
7) after sucssefully finishing the instalition, go to your program files again, find win mm 6 file, right click 'Create short cut'.
8) A short cut will be created on your desk top, open it, find Windows movie maker aplic. And run it! 

FINISH! 
I hope it will help you! :)

Nice torrent. Got it up and running and it works perfectly! And to answer every ones questions.
1. It doesnt go in the folder "programfiles x64(or)x86" but just "programfiles".
2. Even though it may appear to be installed all ready its not... So run the install as Admin and continue by pressing any key. Keep pressing enter as it should say success or w/e.
3. Create a shortcut and put it on desktop or w/e and your good to go! (:
Hope this helped.

Works pretty good for me, although it froze up on after going to options and I about shit myself because I was going to lose a movie I spent 2 hours making. 

Windows process details said it was hanging on csrss.exe, and Googling showed problems with Chrome and this Windows process. I closed out all my Chrome windows and it unfroze, praise the lawd...so kill Chrome if MM freezes up on you.

Other problem is if I view the movie at a specific spot and not the beginning, the audio is not in sync. I suspect this could be related to fddshow audio codec and will disable it in options next time I make a movie to see if this solves the problem. 

Anyways, thanks a lot for this, and F U Micro$oft for ruining a great video creation program. Latest Moviemaker is such garbage, the main reason being no timeline.
